postlist.title: How to Fix Redmi Bluetooth Earphones with One-Sided Sound Issue
postlist.excerpt: Introduction If you’re experiencing an issue with your Bluetooth earphones where only one side has sound, you might have been searching for solutions online. Unfortunately, not all online advice is reliable. To help fellow users, I’m sharing my tested solution to this problem. Solution Unpair your earphones from your phone.
